## Testing Checklist

### For Documentation Changes
- [ ] Markdown renders correctly (no broken formatting)
- [ ] All links are valid
- [ ] Images load properly (if applicable)
- [ ] Follows existing style conventions

### For Skill File Changes
- [ ] Tested with Claude Code locally
- [ ] Example prompts produce helpful responses
- [ ] Code examples use correct syntax
- [ ] Decimal notation used for numbers (`0.0` not `0`)
- [ ] Task/variable names are case-sensitive and correct

### For New Tutorials
- [ ] Steps tested in Portals environment
- [ ] Screenshots/images added to `.gitbook/assets/`
- [ ] Difficulty level appropriate for target audience
- [ ] Added to SUMMARY.md navigation
